front.title: Proxy Load Balancing in the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a few methods which can assist operators of proxies in the in the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Protocol. The methods described here improve proxy load balancing and rate limiting, without requiring any changes to the underlying protocol. While these methods have been shown to work in practice, there has been insufficient experience with them to publish this document either as standards track, or as a best current practice.
